entries.journal_entry_description: Hunt the feared katarn in the depths of the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Your last trial from Krepauk is to hunt and defeat the mighty katarn of the Rryatt Trail.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Hunt the Katarn on the Rryatt Trail
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Krepauk and let him know of your success hunting the feared katarn.
